titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 127 East Locust Street in Fairbury, Illinois, as the "Dr. Francis Townsend Post Office Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5930-5931)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in Senate

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 161.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Davis (IL) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1352.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

ORDER OF PROCEDURE - Mr. Visclosky asked unanimous consent that the proceedings by which the yeas and nays were ordered on the motion to suspend the rules and pass S. 1352 be vacated to the end that the Chair put the question de novo. Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR 6/18/2007 H6591)

bill.summary: 7/2/2007--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 127 East Locust Street in Fairbury, Illinois, as the "Dr. Francis Townsend Post Office Building."
